casebody.data:
2002-2591 (La. 10/18/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Elvert SHAW. No. 2002-KK-2591. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 18, 2002.

In re State of Louisiana; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. K, Nos. 424-406, 424-421; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-K-2076.

Denied.
